title: How to Put Video on a Web Page

steps.title: Search for the video which you want to include, or upload your own.
steps.content: Search for the video which you want to include, or upload your own .

steps.title: Find the embed option on the page, or, if you are watching this YouTube video on a website other than youtube.com, (in other words, if it is already embedded) the option will appear at the end of the video.
steps.content: Find the embed option on the page, or, if you are watching this YouTube video on a website other than youtube.com, (in other words, if it is already embedded) the option will appear at the end of the video.

steps.title: Copy the code supplied to the clipboard.
steps.content: Copy the code supplied to the clipboard. ( Right Click > Copy or Ctrl > C for Windows users.)

steps.title: Paste the code into your webpage where you want the video to appear.
steps.content: Paste the code into your webpage where you want the video to appear. ( Right Click > Paste or Ctrl > V for Windows users)

steps.title: Locate the file.
steps.content: Locate the file. The recommendation is that you upload the video to your own server, rather than hot linking (directly using) video on other websites.

steps.title: Put the URL of the file in an tag.
steps.content: Put the URL of the file in an tag. For example:

steps.title: Add this code to your webpage, changing Example.avi to your file.
steps.content: Add this code to your webpage, changing Example.avi to your file.

steps.title: Locate the file, as in the Inline Video section.
steps.content: Locate the file, as in the Inline Video section.

steps.title: Embed the file.
steps.content: Embed the file. This can be done in a few ways. Here are some examples:

steps.title: Use the following code as an example:
steps.content: Use the following code as an example: <object width="160" height="144" classid="clsid:02BF25D5-8C17-4B23-BC80-D3488ABDDC6B" codebase="http://www.apple.com/qtactivex/qtplugin.cab"> <param name="src" value="Example.mov"> <param name="autoplay" value="true"> <param name="controller" value="false"> <embed src="sample.mov" width="160" height="144" autoplay="true" controller="false" pluginspage="http://www.apple.com/quicktime/download/"> </embed> </object>

steps.title: Add this code to your web page, changing Example.mov to your file name, and changing some of the parameters if you like.
steps.content: Add this code to your web page, changing Example.mov to your file name, and changing some of the parameters if you like.

steps.title: Use the following code as an example:
steps.content: Use the following code as an example: <object width="320" height="240" classid="clsid:CFCDAA03-8BE4-11cf-B84B-0020AFBBCCFA"> <param name="controls" value="ImageWindow" /> <param name="autostart" value="true" /> <param name="src" value="Example.ram" /> </object>

steps.title: Add this code to your web page, changing Example.ram to your file name, and changing some of the parameters if you like.
steps.content: Add this code to your web page, changing Example.ram to your file name, and changing some of the parameters if you like.

steps.title: Use the following simple code as an example:
steps.content: Use the following simple code as an example: Click here to play a video file

steps.title: Add this code to your webpage, changing Example.avi to your file name, and changing some of the parameters if you like.
steps.content: Add this code to your webpage, changing Example.avi to your file name, and changing some of the parameters if you like.
